settings.subtitle: Welcome our Chief Wellness Ambassador
settings.title: Tony Gonzalez Joins Caldera+Lab
settings.copy: A legitimate wellness warrior that walks the walk, Tony is teaming up with us to help inspire men to prioritize their wellness and become the best version of themselves.

settings.title: Bags / puffiness
settings.text: Adaptogens, seaweed, and aloe help soothe and firm the appearance of skin.

settings.title: Fine Lines & Wrinkles
settings.text: Hexapeptide-11 helps smooth the appearance of lines and wrinkles around the eye.

settings.title: Dark Circles
settings.text: Plant stem cells, raspberry seed oil, and potato starch help combat the look of dark circles and tired eyes.

settings.main_text: The Eyecon uses a breakthrough peptide, rich plant stem cell extracts, and adaptogens to address the 3 most common skin concerns around the eye.

settings.headline: A 1-Step Skincare Solution For Eye Bags, Dark Circles & Crows Feet
settings.content: You asked and we listened! The eye product that pairs perfectly with our regimen is finally here.
settings.content_bottom:
They say that the eyes are windows to the soul - but did you know that in many cases they're causing you to look fatigued, overworked, stressed or dare we suggest simply older than you feel.

 

The Eyecon was our answer to this challenge, a product we've spent years working on.  One that will start delivering visible improvements in as little as 14 days (but our money-back guarantee lasts four times that long!)

settings.headline: We Poured Nature’s Best Into A Bottle
settings.content: The Good contains 27 active botanicals infused over 4 weeks in an ECOCERT COSMOS-certified facility.
settings.content_bottom: Sourced with wild-harvested, non-GMO and organic ingredients, this lightweight serum is dermatologist-vetted and proven to give you your best skin ever.

settings.content: "I was getting compliments from you guys, I've had people tell me how good my skin looks right now"
settings.reviwer_name: - Adam Schafer Host of Mind Pump Podcast    @mindpumpadam

settings.content: "Simply The Best! I am a family physician...tried many products but nothing like this. The Good rolled back years on my face. Recommending it to all my middle-aged patients and they are seeing results too. Can't go wrong!"
settings.reviwer_name: - Dr. Terry Wagner, Family Physician, Ohio

settings.paragraph: "This trio of products was both simple to apply and a joy to use, leaving my skin feeling refreshed, energized and clean."
"We can't say enough good things about this serum. It's made in Jackson Hole, Wyoming, from painstakingly sourced natural ingredients."
"The holy grail of face serums, for the guy who's luxury skincare curious."
"I've been using Caldera + Lab The Good Multi-Functional Serum for several weeks and it's an absolute keeper."

settings.title: Proven Results For All Skin Types
settings.copy: In a highly unregulated industry, we conducted an extensive clinical trial to verify that The Good: Moisturizes Skin, Tightens & Smooths, Reduces Lines & Improves Skin Tone.

settings.review_text: "I love how moisturizing the eyecon cream is! I can visibly see brightening under my eyes when using this product. It will for sure be a staple in my skin regimen."
"My new secret for looking awake and rested every morning. This stuff does wonders for my crow’s feet and puffiness. I’ve noticed it work in just a few short weeks."

"Wow! The Eyecon immediately reduced the puffiness and dark circles under my eyes. I catch a lot of "red eye" flights for work and have to show up looking rested and refreshed. The Eyecon helps me do that. It's now another tool in my toolbox."

"My skin has an immediate positive response to The Eyecon. Upon application my skin is more radiant, tight and eliminates the appearance of being tired after a late night or long work day. A couple weeks afterwards using The Eyecon my crows feet are less visible."
"After using only one pump, the bags and dark circles disappear. I look well-rested, and I'm ready to start my day. I've also noticed that my crow's feet have gotten less noticeable."

"I am approaching my 66th Birthday and I only wish ‘The Good’ was available many years ago! My skin feels fresher, younger and firmer! Feeling blessed and refreshed! Texture is smooth, skin looks fresh and application takes no time!"

"Ever since I started using this serum I’ve noticed that my skin is firmer. It’s more evenly toned. It’s not dry is some spots oily in others. No wrinkles on my forehead or around my eyes. Thanks to Caldera+Lab my skins hasn’t looked this good in twenty years. Everyday I wake up to younger skin."

"Simply The Best! I am a family physician...tried many products but nothing like this. The Good rolled bck years on my face. Recommending it to all my middle-aged patients and they are seeing results too. Can't go wrong!"

settings.headline: Limited-Time Promotion (Ends 2/15)
settings.content: Enjoy our membership perks on your first order with no commitment.
settings.content_bottom:
Join the thousands of men enjoying younger-looking skin with our exclusive November promotion. 


Typically only subscription members receive our 20% savings benefit on orders.


However, right now we are extending the same 20% savings to first-time customers with no membership commitment required.

Plus we're including free super-fast shipping so you'll have the product in hand in just a few days.

Why are we offering this? Well, we're confident you'll love The Eyecon and are hoping to see you back as a member in 60 days once you start noticing real results.

So ready to look as young as you feel?

Shop the Promotion below.

*Promotion valid on this page only*

settings.heading: Caldera + Lab Ambassadors
settings.text: We've teamed up with renowned athletes, trainers, authors, podcasters, creators, and accomplished personalities who use their passion to make the world a better place.

settings.heading: SCIENCE
settings.content: A clinical trial revealed that 100% of participants using our 3-product Regimen of The Good, The Base Layer & The Clean Slate experienced smoother and healthier looking skin.

settings.heading: MISSION
settings.content: The skincare industry is facing a difficult problem with plastic waste. We’re doing our part with 100% recyclable glass, ethically sourced wood and as little plastic as possible.

settings.heading: INGREDIENTS
settings.content: We sustainably wild-harvest plants that grow naturally on the mountainside at 9000 feet to capture the highest quality antioxidant potential. Our plants pack a punch!
